dev: I'm a developer website frontend - MERN
p_intro: I started with programming quite late. It came to me at random, when I had free time during social distancing. After about 5 months of self-study, I tried my hand at many projects and various company models. It gives me friends, brothers with many different colors that I have never experienced...
p_relationship: I am not afraid to learn new knowledge as well as experience different environments to develop myself. Marginalized a bit: I'm single T-T.
confide_1: Thank you to the recruiters who read all of my online CV.
confide_2: After working for a while, I decided to make my CV online so that everyone could monitor and evaluate my ability.
confide_3: I also want to break CV standards with boring pdf. It also shows a part of my personality.
